welcome_message_body: Welcome to Kikuyu, Kenya! This vibrant city is known for its lush green landscapes, traditional culture, and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Kikuyu has to offer. Karibu!

restaurants.name: Tai's Chicken
restaurants.description: Tai's Chicken is a fast food restaurant located in Kiambu.

restaurants.name: choma zone
restaurants.description: choma zone is a steakhouse located in the city.

restaurants.name: Pork Centre, Uthiru
restaurants.description: Pork Centre, Uthiru is a bbq joint located in Nairobi.

restaurants.name: Debonairs Pizza
restaurants.description: Debonairs Pizza is a pizzeria located in Nairobi.
restaurants.address: Total Petrol Station, Waiyaki Way, Westlands, Nairobi

restaurants.name: Talisman
restaurants.description: Talisman is a mediterranean restaurant located in Karen.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Wilson Airport handles domestic flights within Kenya.

terminals.name: VIP Terminal
terminals.description: The VIP terminal at Wilson Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Dedicated to international flights for select airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A newly constructed terminal for low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
